name: Canon EF 17-40mm f/4L USM Lens
description: The EF 17-40mm f/4L USM Lens is a Canon L-series zoom featuring a constant f/4 maximum aperture along with a sophisticated optical design and durable construction.

name: Canon EF 50mm f/1.2L USM Lens
description: The Canon EF 50mm f/1.2L USM is a normal-length L-series prime. The fast f/1.2 maximum aperture affords a great degree of control over the depth of field.

name: Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens
description: Featuring a versatile telephoto range, the EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III from Canon is a 4x zoom characterized by its relatively lightweight design and compact form factor.

name: Canon EF 85mm f/1.8 USM Lens
description: The EF 85mm f/1.8 USM from Canon is a telephoto prime. Its bright f/1.8 maximum aperture also enables isolating subjects and working with shallow depth of field techniques, and further benefits working in low-light conditions.

name: Canon EF-S 10-18mm f/4.5-5.6 IS STM Lens
description: A flexible wide-angle zoom in a compact form factor, the EF-S 10-18mm f/4.5-5.6 IS STM from Canon is a 16-28.8mm equivalent lens designed for EF-S-mount DSLRs. Helping to reduce the overall size while maintaining high optical quality.

name: Nikon AF-S NIKKOR 24-70mm f/2.8E
description: Nikon's AF-S NIKKOR 24-70mm f/2.8E ED VR Lens is a truly versatile wide-angle to short telephoto lens characterized by its constant f/2.8 maximum aperture and electromagnetic aperture mechanism.

name: Nikon AF-S 200-500mm f/5.6E
description: Spanning a long, versatile zoom range, the AF-S NIKKOR 200-500mm f/5.6E ED VR Lens from Nikon is a telephoto zoom characterized by a constant f/5.6 maximum aperture for consistent performance throughout the zoom range.

name: Nikon AF-S VR 105mm f/2.8G
description: A contemporary take on the classic short telephoto macro lens, the Nikon AF-S VR Micro-NIKKOR 105mm f/2.8G IF-ED excels at close range with its life-size 1:1 maximum magnification and a minimum focusing distance of 1.

name: Sigma 35mm f/1.4 DG HSM
description: An optically advanced wide-angle prime, the Canon EF 35mm f/1.4 DG HSM  Lens from Sigma mixes a comfortable focal length with an especial design. The bright f/1.4 maximum aperture helps the shallow depth of field and selective focus effects.

name: Sigma 18-35mm f/1.8
description: Sigma 18-35mm f/1.8 DC HSM is an Art-series zoom, covering wide-angle to normal focal lengths. Separating itself from the pack, this zoom features an exceedingly bright f/1.8 constant maximum aperture.

name: Sigma 150-600mm f/5-6.3 DG OS
description: The Nikon F-mount 150-600mm f/5-6.3 DG OS HSM from Sigma is as telephoto zoom characterized by its sophisticated optics and flexible handling.

name: Sigma 105mm f/2.8 EX DG
description: The 105mm f/2.8 EX DG from Sigma is a short-telephoto prime lens, life-size magnification along with a 1 minimum focusing distance for macro applications.
